## Week 1: Data Collection

**Topics**: HTTP, curl, APIs, OMDb/TMDb, Web Scraping (BeautifulSoup)

### Lecture (1.5 hours)
- [PDF](pdf/week1-data-collection-lecture.pdf) | [HTML](html/week1-data-collection-lecture.html) | [Source](https://github.com/nipunbatra/stt-ai-teaching/blob/master/slides/week1-data-collection-lecture.md)
- Content: The web data pipeline, HTTP fundamentals, using `curl` and DevTools, automating with Python `requests`, parsing HTML with `BeautifulSoup`.

### Lab (3 hours)
- [PDF](pdf/week1-data-collection-lab.pdf) | [HTML](html/week1-data-collection-lab.html) | [Source](https://github.com/nipunbatra/stt-ai-teaching/blob/master/slides/week1-data-collection-lab.md)
- Exercises: Building a robust movie data collector using OMDb API, scraping IMDb top lists, saving structured data.
